parameter.name: wikiSpaceId
parameter.description: Optional if pagePath is a wikiPageId or the first segment is a wikiSpaceId

parameter.name: pagePath
parameter.description: Not required, is empty for the space root page. Can be a wikiPageId or the page path within the space.

parameter.name: filename
parameter.description: If not specified last segment of pagePath will be used

actions.script: ec.logger.info("Deleting file ${filename} for page path ${pagePath} in space ${wikiSpaceId} location ${attachmentReference.location}") attachmentReference.delete()
